title: Cymate
detaileddescription: A graduation project developed for CIS Mansoura University. This comprehensive web application features advanced functionality built with modern technologies. The project demonstrates full-stack development skills with React.js frontend, Django backend, and Node.js services.

title: Denimora
detaileddescription: A comprehensive e-commerce platform built for a freelancing client. This project features a modern design, full shopping cart functionality, user authentication, product management, and Bosta shipping integration. Built with React.js frontend and Django backend with RESTful API architecture.
features: Admin panel for stock and business management

title: Web Portfolio
detaileddescription: A modern, responsive portfolio website showcasing my development skills and projects. Built with React.js and styled with custom CSS, featuring smooth animations, responsive design, and clean user interface.
